name: "Buckets" Nelson
effect: Shootout: Discard a card from your hand to create one shark in Nelson's posse if this Shootout is taking place at an out-of-town location. The shark is a dude with a one-Bullet Stud rating. The shark is removed from play after the Shootout is over. Nelson can perform this action any number of times per turn.

name: "Frank"
effect: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Texas Ranger Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Texas Ranger Dude in this location.

name: ...And Scooter Exp.
effect: Experienced. Lower Scooter's ghost rock cost and Upkeep cost by 1 when bringing him into play from your Play hand, if you have Big Jake in play. Noon: Boot Big Jake at a non-Strike Deed. Take ghost rock from the Deed's owner equal to either the Deed's Production or Jake's Influence, whichever is lower.

name: 2nd Bank of Gomorra
effect: Private.

name: A Coach Comes to Town
effect: Any one of your opponents dudes can do a job to rob the stage in the Town Square. Any of your dudes can put together a posse to protect it. If the stage goes unprotected or your opponent wins the shootout, you must pay your opponent 4 Ghost Rock (or your total Ghost Rock if you have less than 4). If you win the Shootout or the stage is not attacked, you gain 4 ghost rock.

name: A Legal Deck
effect: Reaction: Play this card when a Joker is revealed in a draw or pull. Cancel and ace the Joker, and replace it with the top card of its player's deck.

name: A Secret Tunnel
effect: Noon: Choose two deeds you own. There is a secret tunnel between those two deeds and they are considered "adjacent" whenever you wish for the rest of the game.

name: Abandoned Mine
effect: Private. Strike. Only Terrors may move to the Abandoned Mine.

name: Abel Owens
effect: Abel's value cannot be changed in any way.

name: Ace in the Hole
effect: Reaction: Play after Draw Hands have been revealed for any draw. You may discard one of your cards and replace it with either a card from your Play Hand or the top card from your deck.

name: Acid Gun
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:4 Shootout Pull: If the pull is black, this Dude has his or her Bullet rating reduced by 1 (minimum 0) and is a Draw for this round of the shootout. If the pull is red, this Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and is a Stud for this round of the shootout.

name: Alice Chamberlain
effect: Mad Scientist:0 Weapon Gadgets being made by Alice Chamberlain have their ghost rock cost reduced by 2. Reaction: When you have aced a Wanted Dude with a posse including Alice Chamberlain, take 1 additional ghost rock from the Wanted Dude's controller (if possible) after taking your ghost rock reward.

name: Ambition
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability "Shootout: Boot this Dude to move this Dude to the shootout's location and join your posse." Ace this card.

name: Ambush
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and assemble a posse to ace any dude in play. If the job is successful, the target is aced. All of the dudes in your posse become Wanted unless the target was Wanted.

name: And Stay Down!
effect: Reaction: Play when a Harrowed dude is about to be aced. The Harrowed dude is aced and sent to Boot Hill - no pull is performed.

name: Apache Devil Dancers
effect: Reaction Spirit 6: Boot this Shaman immediately after an event is revealed in someone's lowball Draw hand. If this Spirit is successful, that event is discarded without effect. Reaction Spirit 8: Boot this Shaman immediately after an event is revealed in someone's lowball Draw hand. If this Spirit is successful, that event is aced without effect.

name: Arcane Protection
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, all Spells targeting that Dude have +5 Difficulty.

name: Arizona Jane Exp.
effect: Experienced. Jane will not call out an Agency Dude. Noon: Jane boots to move to a location you own that contains one or more Dudes controlled by another player. Jane issues an unrefusable call-out to one of the Dudes.

name: Armor Of Righteousness
effect: Shootout Miracle 6: If this Miracle succeeds, target one of your Dudes in this shootout. That Dude cannot be aced in this shootout unless you lose by at least two ranks.

name: Army of Gremlins
effect: Until after Nightfall, Gadgets do not affect play and are considered blank Goods except for their names. Every Dude with one or more of these Gadgets has -1 Influence until after Nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Arson
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and name a deed in play. If the job is successful, Pull: if the pull is clubs or spades, ace the deed, and everyone in your posse becomes Wanted.

name: Autogyro
effect: Horse. Gadget Difficulty:6 Noon: Boot the Autogyro to move this Dude to another location. Noon: Boot the Autogyro to move this Dude and another Dude at this Dude's location to another location.

name: Bad Tequila
effect: Noon: Boot any dude in play with influence less than two.

name: Bad to the Bone
effect: Noon: Target a Wanted Dude, who gains a +2 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, Dudes must pay the target's controller 3 ghost rock to refuse a call-out from the target, in addition to any other costs. Any player other than the target's controller who aces the target before Nightfall gains 1 Victory Point.

name: Bankrupt Morals
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Return the player's entire Vault to the Bank. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Barkum & Barkum Attorneys
effect: Private. Controller Noon Pull: Boot the attorneys and one of your Wanted dudes. If the pull's value is less than or equal to the dude's value, the dude is no longer Wanted.

name: Barthalomew Prospectus
effect: Mad Scientist:2 Reaction: Boot Barhalomew immediately after you perform a noon action. You may perform another one immediately.

name: Bedrock
effect: Improvement Bedrock can only be attached to a Strike, but you can attach it to a Strike you do not own or control. Bedrock lowers the Strike's Production to +1, and the Production cannot be increased.

name: Benjamin Dean
effect: Shootout: Target a Terror in this Shootout. If that Terror is aced during the Shootout, the Fear Level is reduced by one (minimum one).

name: Big Jake… Exp.
effect: Experienced. Lower Jake's ghost rock cost and Upkeep cost by 1 when bringing him into play from your Play hand, if you have Scooter in play. Noon: Boot Scooter at a Strike. Take ghost rock from the Strike's owner equal to either the Strike's Production or Scooter's Bullet rating, whichever is lower.

name: Billy No-Neck Exp.
effect: Experienced. Billy will not attach Weapons. Shootout: Target an opposing Dude with a Weapon attached. Until the shootout ends, the Dude cannot be the shooter if another Dude can, and the Dude's Bullet rating does not contribute to the number of cards you draw or redraw.

name: Black Jack Exp.
effect: Experienced. Black Jack is always Wanted, and cannot become un-Wanted. You always get to perform the first Shootout action when Black Jack is in your posse, continuing to the player on your left.

name: Blackjacks
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Noon: Boot one of your Blackjacks dudes to gain 2 ghost rock. The dude becomes Wanted. This action can be performed any number of times per turn.

name: Blood Curse
effect: Noon Hex 8: If this Hex is successful, one dude in play has a -1 Bullet and -1 Influence penalty until after nightfall. Shootout Hex 9: If this Hex is successful, one dude in this shootout has a -2 Bullet penalty until nightfall.

name: Blood Oath
effect: Reaction Spirit 6: When bringing a Dude from another Outfit into play, boot this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, the Dude becomes a member of your Outfit for the rest of the game.

name: Bobo LeVeux
effect: Huckster:2 Reaction: Boot Bobo immediately before a hex pull is made by a dude with a lower huckster rating than Bobo. The hex is automatically unsuccessful.

name: Bookstore
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Pay 3 ghost rock and discard a card from your hand. Get any one Spell from your deck, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand. Shuffle the deck.

name: Bounty Hunter
effect: Noon: A Bounty Hunter (dude) with a two stud Bullet Rating and zero Influence, calls out one Wanted dude in play who cannot refuse. The Bounty Hunter is under your control. After the shootout, the Bounty Hunter is removed from play.

name: Bowie Knife
effect: This dude has a +1 Bullet Rating at all times, but cannot get bonuses from more than one Bowie Knife at a time.

name: Brewery
effect: Improvement. The Brewery can only be attached to a Saloon. The Brewery's Deed gains +2 production.

name: Bucket Brigade
effect: Reaction: Play when one deed is about to be aced. The deed is not aced, but may not perform any actions for the rest of this turn and does not produce ghost rock next turn.

name: Bum Rush
effect: Shootout: One of your dudes in this Shootout gets a +1 Bullet bonus for this Shootout. Only one Bum Rush can be played per Shootout.

name: Burn 'Em Down
effect: Shootout: Boot one of your dudes in this Shootout to reduce the Bullet Rating of one opposing dude in this gunfight by a number of Bullets equal to your dude`s Bullet Rating.

name: Burnt Offerin'
effect: Noon Miracle Job 6: Boot this Blessed and form a posse to burn down a Deed. If the job succeeds and this Blessed is still in the posse, perform the Miracle pull. If the Miracle succeeds, the Deed and this Miracle are aced and you gain Victory Points equal to the Control-Point value of the Deed, plus 1.

name: Buster Madison Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:1 Noon: If Buster is at a Saloon, target another Dude at the Saloon. Take 1 ghost rock from the Dude's controller.

name: Cain Regen
effect: Reaction: When Cain becomes Wanted, boot him. He becomes non-Wanted.

name: Callahan's Ditch
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Camille Sinclair
effect: Shootout: Camile gets a +1 bullet if there is a Terror in the opposing posse.

name: Captain Sim Yut-San Exp.
effect: Experienced Noon: Boot Captain Sim and reduce his Influence to zero to reduce the Influence of any dude in play to zero. These reductions last until the end of the turn.

name: Cassandra
effect: Harrowed. Mystical Goods being attached to Cassandra cost 2 less ghost rock. Reaction: Immediately before bringing a Terror into play, boot Cassandra. Lower the Terror's ghost rock cost by 2.

name: Chao Li
effect: Huckster:0 Chao Li has +2 Influence for determining who draws an extra card for having the most total Influence during Nightfall.

name: Charlie Flatbush Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: If Charlie is at an in-town Deed, raise his Influence to equal the Influence of another Dude at the Deed, until after Nightfall.

name: Charlie Landers
effect: Charlie Landers may not be called out. Charlie cannot move to a location you do not control. Noon: Boot Charlie when in a saloon to dispense free drinks, resulting in a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) until nightfall, for all other dudes in the same saloon as Charlie.

name: Chester Nero Exp.
effect: Experienced. Harrowed. Chester can be targeted by two copies of each Harrowed Ability card.

name: Claim Jumper
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes at a strike you Control. You are now the Owner of the strike until the end of the game.

name: Claws
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, the target has a +2 Bullet bonus while he or she has no ready Weapons.

name: Clean Up the Town
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes to call out any Wanted dude who is in town. If he refuses, his Influence is permanently reduced to zero. If it was already zero, he is aced if he refuses.

name: Clell Miller
effect: Non-Unique. Clell Miller gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus each time his posse aces another dude with a higher Bullet Rating in a Shootout.

name: Collegium- The New Front
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 All of your Collegium Dudes gain +1 Influence while they have at least 1 Gadget Weapon attached and ready. You get 1 Victory Point every time you ace an opposing Stud in a shootout if one of your Dudes in the posse has a Gadget Weapon ready.

name: Colorado Lode
effect: Private. Strike. You may ace any one strike that produces less than 3 ghost rock per turn when this card is brought into play. If you ace your own strike, then the cost of this strike is reduced by the production value of the one you aced.

name: Corky's Sidearm
effect: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Law Dog Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Law Dog Dude in this location.

name: Cort Williams
effect: Terrors in the same location as Williams have their influence reduced to zero. Shootout: Ace a Terror in this Shootout.

name: Cover Fire
effect: Reaction: When a Shootout action targets one of your Dudes, boot one of your other Dudes in the same posse. Cancel the action.

name: Coyote's Laugh
effect: Shootout Spirit: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman moves to the shootout's location, ignoring movement restrictions, and joins your posse.

name: Crack Shot
effect: Shootout: One dude's Draw bonus is changed to a Stud bonus until the end of this Shootout.

name: Darren Titus
effect: Noon: If Darren Titus and another Blackjacks Dude are in the Town Square, boot the other Dude to increase Darren Titus's Influence by 1 until after Nightfall. You can do this any number of times per turn. Darren Titus loses this Influence bonus while at home.

name: Dead Man's Laughter Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Deadland
effect: Public. Non-Unique. Bring into play for free if the Fear Level is 6 or higher. Subsequent Deadlands must have 1 higher Fear Level to be played. Controller Reaction: Boot when you are bringing a Terror into play to produce 5 ghost rock.

name: Dealer's Choice
effect: All Draws are played as Lowball until after nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Death's Head Joker
effect: Death's Head Joker This card is only useful for Draws. If it is pulled, ace it and redraw. Ace this card after it used in a draw. If it is revealed as part of a lowball Draw hand during the Gambling Phase, it is aced and replaced by the top card of your deck. If it is revealed in a shootout Draw hand, it can be any suit and value, and in addition the lowest value dude in the opposing posse is aced before hand ranks are compared. This card does not count against your deck limit. You may not have more than two Jokers in your deck.

name: Deer Eater
effect: Other players' Shootout actions cannot target Deer Eater. Deer Eater will not trade away Goods. Noon: If Deer Eater is not equipped with a Sioux-only Goods card, you can attach one to him from your hand for 2 less ghost rock.

name: Den of Eastern Delights
effect: Public. Non-Unique. Owner Reaction: Boot to cancel the effects of an event immediately after it is revealed. The event is aced.

name: Deputize
effect: Noon: All of your dudes that are not currently in your Outfit become members of your Outfit.

name: Deputy Dave Montreal
effect: Call-outs from Deputy Dave Montreal cannot be refused unless he is Wanted.

name: Deputy John Templeton Exp.
effect: Experienced. Card effects cannot save Dudes being aced while opposing Templeton in a shootout.

name: Desmond Quentin
effect: Mad Scientist:2 Desmond Quentin will not trade a Gadget to a non-Agency Dude.

name: Dispatch Office
effect: Private. Any of the Controller's dudes at this location with Influence greater than zero has his or her Influence increased by one while at this location.

name: Doctor Duvalier
effect: Huckster:2 While Doctor Duvalier is at a Strike, the Strike gains +1 Production.

name: Dolores Whateley
effect: Huckster:0 Noon: Boot Dolores to give a -1 Bullet penalty to any dude until nightfall. Noon: Discard a black card to give Dolores a +2 Bullet bonus and to raise her Huckster rank by two until nightfall.

name: Don't Like Yer Looks
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes in the Town Square or any deed you control to call out any other dude in the same location. They begin a Shootout that can't berefused and no other dudes may join the Shootout.

name: Double Dealin'
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. That Player's entire Draw Hand is discarded and replaced by the top five cards of your deck. Your cards are discarded normally afterwards. Only one Cheatin' card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Dr. Reginald Branson
effect: Reaction: Boot Dr. Branson when a dude is aced in a Shootout when the difference in Draw Hands was less than 2 Ranks and you have at least one other dude at that location. Pull: If the value is less than the dude's value, the dude survives and goes to your home booted.

name: Dragon's Claw
effect: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Maze Rat Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Maze Rat Dude in this location.

name: Dragon's Nest Strike
effect: Private. Strike. The dude or dudes in play with the lowest value are aced when this strike is put into play from your Play Hand.

name: Dread Wolf Pack
effect: Non-Unique. Abomination. The Dread Wolf Pack cannot attach goods. Shootout: If only one Dude is in the opposing posse, the Dread Wolf Pack gains a +3 Bullet bonus until the shootout ends.

name: Dream Catcher
effect: Terrors cannot call out this Dude. Terrors in the same location as this Dude have their Bullet rating and Influence decreased by 1 (minimum 0).

name: Drop in the Ocean Strike
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Drought
effect: For each dude that any player wishes to unboot during nightfall this turn, that player must pay one ghost rock, or the dude remains booted.

name: Dumb Luck
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after a successful magic pull. The pull is cancelled, and the dude performing the magic must pull again. If the second pull is unsuccessful, the dude is booted and may not perform any other actions this turn.

name: Dust Devil
effect: Noon: Ace any one goods card in play.

name: Eagle Rock Exp.
effect: Experienced.

name: Electrostatic Pump Gun
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:5 Shootout: This Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout. Shootout: This Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout.

name: Electrothermic Entropy Projector
effect: Unique. Weapon. Gadget. Can only be attached to a Collegium Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Collegium Dude in this location. When bringing this Gadget into play, it can be attached to Dudes other than Mad Scientists, and does not require a skill check.

name: Elysium Fields Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Erik Zarkov
effect: Mad Scientist:1 Shootout Pull: If the pull is a Club, Zarkov is aced. Otherwise, one weapon Gadget Zarkov carries gets a 3 Bullet bonus for this Shootout.

name: Eureka's Rage
effect: Noon: If this is the last card in your hand, draw cards equal to your maximum hand size.

name: Eureka?!?
effect: If 'Eureka!' is in play, it is sent to the card owner's Boot Hill. Eureka enters play attached to the gang on your left. Whenever Eureka attaches to a Player's gang, he must discard one card from his or her hand. A Player's hand size is reduced by one while Eureka is attached. Eureka leaves that Player when he or she wins a shootout and attaches to the next player on the left. Only one Eureka can be in play at a time.

name: Ezzie
effect: The Harrowed Harlot. Noon: Boot Ezzie and target a dude. That dude's Controller performs three Pulls: if all three pulls are higher than the dude's value, the dude is aced. If the dude's controller cannot make three pulls, any pulls the controller cannot make are considered successful.

name: Faminite
effect: Abomination. The Faminite cannot move to a location that contains a Blessed.

name: Fanning the Hammer
effect: Reaction: Play when your posse has won a round of a Shootout to increase by two the number of dudes aced in the opposing posse.

name: Father Juan Navarro
effect: Father Juan may not boot to perform the Blackjack Outfit's ability. Shootout: Boot Father Juan to withdraw him from any Shootout. He returns home.

name: Father Terrance
effect: Blessed:1 Father Terrance's Influence equals the Fear level minus 6 (minimum 0).

name: Fineas Von Landingham Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:1 Noon: Move Fineas to a different location.

name: Fire and Brimstone
effect: Noon Miracle 6: If this Miracle succeeds, boot a Wanted Ddue at this or an adjacent location. If this Miracle does not succeed, discard it. This Blessed can perform this Miracle any number of times per turn.

name: Fish Ridge Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Flamethrower
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:5 You must pay one ghost rock to use this weapon in a Shootout. This dude is a Stud in a Shootout. If a dude carrying the flamethrower is aced in a Shootout, Pull: If it is odd, then the flamethrower explodes, acing two more of your dudes in this fight (your choice).

name: Flamin' Barrels
effect: Shootout: Target a Dude with a ready Weapon in your posse. Until the shootout ends, the Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus.

name: Foale's Folly
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Fool's Joker
effect: The Fool's Joker is only useful for pulls. If you pull it, you choose its suit and value. If you reveal it in a Draw hand, discard it, then replace it with the top card of your deck. You cannot have more than two Jokers in your deck. The Fool's Joker does not count against your deck limit.

name: Foreclosure
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. Select one deed owned by that player which is discarded. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Fortune-Teller's Shop
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Look at the top card of any deck.

name: Founder's Day
effect: Gain 2 ghost rock.

name: Friends in Low Places
effect: Noon: Look at one of your opponents' Play Hands.

name: Full Moon
effect: Choose a dude and Pull: If the card's value is greater than the dude's value, then you gain control of the dude until after nightfall, but his upkeep cost is tripled for this turn. If you do not pay the upkeep, the dude is immediately returned to his original Controller. Ace this card.

name: Funeral Procession
effect: Noon: Target one of your Dudes in Boot Hill. Add the Dude's Influence to your total during Nightfall.

name: Gerald Klippstein
effect: Mad Scientist:2 Shootout: Boot Klippstein to move him and any of your dudes at his location into the Shootout's location and join them with either posse.

name: Ghost Infestation
effect: If a Ghost Infestation is in play, that card and this card are aced. Otherwise, this card enters play attached to your Outfit. While this card is in play, no player can win unless he or she also has more Control Points plus Victory Points than the current Fear level.

name: Ghost Rock Fever
effect: Until Nightfall, lower by 2 (minimum 0) the Control Points of each Strike with a value under 5, and lower by 1 (minimum 0) the Control Points of each Strike with a value over 4.

name: Ghost Train
effect: All Terrors have their ghost rock and Upkeep costs reduced by 2 until after Nightfall.

name: Giddyup!
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before one of your dudes boots to join a posse. Your dude does not have to boot to join this posse.

name: Glom
effect: Abomination. Non-Unique. The 'Glom will not attach Goods. Reaction: When a Dude in the same location as the 'Glom is aced and goes to Boot Hill, the 'Glom gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Golden Mare Hotel
effect: Public. Brothel. The Owner gains one ghost rock each time a dude is put into play from someone's Play Hand.

name: Government Audit
effect: After upkeep this turn, all Players must pay 1 ghost rock for each deed they control up to the total ghost rock in their Vault.

name: Graveyard
effect: Private. The Owner gains 3 ghost rock each time a dude is aced. Controller Reaction: Boot the Graveyard to negate the Harrowing of any dude.

name: Green-Eye Saloon
effect: Public. Non-Unique.

name: Gus Gallagher Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: Boot Gus to join a shootout from anywhere as if he were adjactant.

name: Gypsy's Tent
effect: Private. The Gypsy's Tent increases your maximum hand size by one.

name: Harvest Moon
effect: You may add a card from your lowball hand to your Play hand. If you do so, discard a card from your Play hand. Ace this card.

name: Head 'em Off at the Pass
effect: Reaction: Play when a Posse is being assembled for a job. Any one of your dudes can join the posse, regardless of their location and whether or not they are booted. You may not join a posse if the Player assembling it does not want you to.

name: Headsman's Axe
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after any dude is aced. The dude may not be brought into play again through any means.

name: Hell's End Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Holy Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Discard Holy Bullets. Ace an opposing Harrowed Dude. The Dude's controller does not make the Harrowed pull.

name: Homeless Joe
effect: Improvement. Controller Noon: If you have less than four cards in your hand, draw a card.

name: Hostile Takeover
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes at a non-Strike Deed you control. You are now the owner of the Deed until the end of the game (even if it is discarded) unless ownership changes. If the Deed is discarded, you lose ownership if someone else puts it into play.

name: Howlin' Hollow
effect: Private. Strike. Haunted. Controller Noon: Boot to give a Harrowed dude +1 Bullet bonus for this turn.

name: Infared Spectacles
effect: Gadget Difficulty:6 Reaction: Immediately after this Dude moves to a location to call out a Dude at the location, boot the Infrared Spectacles. The target cannot refuse the call-out.

name: Inspiration
effect: Reaction Miracle X: Perform this Miracle immediately after one of your dudes aces a Terror with a value greater than 5. The difficulty of this Miracle is the current fear level times two. If this Miracle is successful, you gain a Victory Point. Discard this Miracle.

name: J.P. Coleman Exp.
effect: Harrowed. Experienced. The Former Sherrif. Reaction: When J.P. is aced in a Shootout, target one dude in the opposing posse. Until the end of the game, while J.P. faces that dude in a Shootout, he gains a +1 Bullet bonus (cumulative).

name: Jackelope Stampede
effect: Cheatin! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. That player must select and discard one of his cards in play. Then, that hand is discarded without effect and the player must draw 5 new cards for his or her Draw hand. That player must continue discarding cards and redrawing until he reveals a legal Draw hand or he has no cards in play. Only one Cheatin' card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Jail
effect: Private. Government. Any Player who aces a Wanted dude may elect instead to put them in the Jail, collecting a bounty equal to half the jailed dude's ghost rock cost. A dude in Jail is out of play (except for uniqueness) until they are broken out with a Noon Job.

name: Jebediah Whateley
effect: Huckster:1

name: Jenny Cooper
effect: Shootout: Move Jenny from her posse to an in-town location. One of your Law Dogs can move from any location to the shootout's location and join the posse.

name: Jessie Freemont Exp.
effect: Experienced. Jessie will only call out Wanted Dudes.

name: Joker
effect: This card is only useful for draws and pulls. Ace this card after it is used in a draw or pull. This card is a Wildcard: it can be any suit and value. You may not have more than two Jokers in a deck. This card does not count against your deck limit.

name: Just a Graze
effect: Reaction: Play after Hands have been shown in a Shootout. The number of your dudes killed in that round is reduced by one and the Shootout continues normally.

name: Katie Karl
effect: Any dude you are bringing into play has his or her cost reduced by their bullet rating while Katie is in play.

name: Kenny
effect: Sidekick. While this dude is in a Shootout, Kenny acts as an additional dude in the posse with a zero-draw Bullet Rating.

name: Kentucky Windage
effect: Shootout Hex 5: If this Hex succeeds, target one Dude in the opposing posse. Any restrictions on acing the target Dude are removed until the end of the shootout, and no new such restriction can be placed on the target Dude for the rest of the shootout.

name: Kidnapping
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes to kidnap any dude in play with a lower Bullet Rating that is controlled by another player. If the job is successful the kidnapped dude is discarded, and all of the dudes in your posse become wanted.

name: King Willy's Mother Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Knicknevin's Deal
effect: Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster. X is the value of a Dude in Boot Hill. If this Hex succeeds, return the Dude to play under your control, Harrowed. Ace this card.

name: Lad Saloon
effect: Public. Any dude called out while occupying the LAD Saloon has +1 Bullet for the shootout.

name: Lady Luck
effect: Noon: You may discard as many of your cards as you like during nightfall this turn.

name: Law Dogs- Hunter's Office
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 All Weapons you are putting into play have their cost halved, rounded down. Noon: One of your Dudes calls out a Wanted Dude at the same location. You may perform this action any number of times per turn.

name: Lay On Hands
effect: Reaction Miracle 8: Boot this blessed when a dude is aced. If this Miracle is successful, the dude is not aced, but is moved home booted. If the Miracle is not successful, this Blessed cannot straighten next turn, and loses one Influence permanently (minimum zero).

name: Legal Offices of ______
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Pay 3 ghost rock to gain one Control Point until after nightfall. A Player may not perform this action more than twice per turn.

name: Locust Swarm
effect: Noon Miracle 7: If this Miracle succeeds, all Dudes at this location except this Blessed go home without booting.

name: Long Arm of the Law
effect: Boot all Wanted dudes in play.

name: Looking Glass
effect: Noon Hex 6: If this Huckster is at an in-town Deed and this Hex succeeds, then until after Nightfall your Dudes are adjacent to all other in-town Deeds while at the Deed.

name: Los Ojos Del Dios
effect: Huckster:0 Shaman:0 Blessed:0

name: Lucifer Whateley
effect: Abomination. Huckster:1 Lucifer's Bullet rating, Influence, and Upkeep cost are equal to half the Fear level, rounded up.

name: Magnum Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Discard Magnum Bullets. Until the shootout ends, negate card effects that prevent opposing Dudes from being aced.

name: Manitou's Control
effect: Noon Pull: Target a Harrowed Dude. If the pull is greater than the Dude's value, control of the Dude passes to the player to the left of the current controller. Control of the Dude returns to normal after Nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Manitou's Revenge
effect: Reaction: Play when a spell fails. Pull: if the value is lower than the spell's difficulty, the dude performing the spell is aced.

name: Marcus Perriwinkle
effect: Non-Unique. Mad Scientist:0 Gadgets being attached to Marcus have their ghost rock cost reduced by two.

name: Massacre at High Noon
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes to attack all dudes at a location. Unbooted dudes can join either posse, even if they cannot normally move to the target location. During the Shootout for this job, all dudes in the Shootout may pay 3 ghost rock and boot to leave the Shootout and move to an adjacent location. If the job is successful, your posse goes home, and all dudes at that location are aced. You may not perform this action on the first turn of the game.

name: Max Baine
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Maze Rats- Landed Rats
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Each of your Deeds owned by another player and worth at least 1 Control Point is worth +1 Control Points. During the Upkeep Phase, you may collect Production for Deeds you control but do not own.

name: Medicine
effect: Reaction Spirit X: Boot this shaman when a dude is aced. The difficulty of this Spirit is equal to the dude's value plus Influence plus Bullets. If the Spirit is successful, the dude is not aced, but is moved home booted.

name: Mental Hospital
effect: Public. Government. Spells cannot target Dudes at the Mental Hospital.

name: Meredith Singleton Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:1 While in a shootout, Meredith decreases the value of every opposing Terror by 5 (minimum 1).

name: Mines Reopen
effect: Reaction: Play this card immediately before the Gambling Phase draw. Play lowball inversely (high hand wins) this turn.

name: Mirror, Mirror
effect: Noon Hex 6: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster copies the Influence or Bullet rating of a Dude at this or an adjacent location, until after Nightfall.

name: Miss Greene's Room
effect: Public. Brothel. Casino. Dudes with less than 1 Influence cannot move to Miss Greene's Room.

name: Miss Me?
effect: Noon Pull: If the Fear level is over 6, target one of your Dudes in Boot Hill. If the pull is less than the Dude's value, return the Dude to your hand. The next time a copy of the Dude enters play, the Dude permanently gains the Harrowed trait.

name: Mr. Bones
effect: Non-Unique. Grifter. Noon: Show your hand to all of your opponents. If your hand does not contain any Cheatin'! cards, you can boot Mr. Bones to get any one Cheatin'! card from your discard pile. Show the card to your opponents, then place it in your hand. Discard one card from your hand.

name: Mr. Prim's Bust
effect: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Sweetrock Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Sweetrock Dude in this location.

name: Nate Hunter Exp.2
effect: Experienced 2 Reaction: When your opponent in a shootout reveals an illegal Draw hand, get a Cheatin'! card from your deck or discard pile and immediately play it. Shuffle the deck if the card came from it.

name: Nebuchadnezzar
effect: Abomination. Shootout: Boot one of your Hucksters. Raise Nebuchadnezzar's Bullet rating by the Huckster's Huckster rating.

name: Nelson Roberts Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: Immediately after a Dude boots to join a posse, lower Nelson's Bullet rating to 0 until the shootout ends and boot a card attached to Nelson with "Rifle" in the title. The Dude still boots but does not move or join the posse.

name: New Moon Saloon
effect: Public. Saloon. The New Moon Saloon counts as the Old Moon Saloon for uniqueness. The New Moon Saloon's ghost rock cost is reduced by 1 for each Mad Scientist in play.

name: New Town Hall
effect: Public. Whenever the current controller loses control of the New Town Hall or the New Town Hall leaves play, the controller loses all Town Hall Victory Points. The New Town Hall's controller is always the player with the most Influence at it, regardless of other card effects. Controller Noon: Gain 1 Town Hall Victory Point.

name: Nice Boots, Chief
effect: Reaction: Play when an opposing dude is aced in a Shootout. Take any one goods from that dude and attach it to one of your dudes that was in the Shootout.

name: Nicodemus Whateley
effect: Huckster:2 Noon: Boot Nicodemus when he is in the same location as an Abomination. You control the Abomination until after nightfall.

name: Nightmare Realm
effect: Noon Hex X: X is the Fear level. If this Hex succeeds, raise the Fear level by 1 until the end of the turn and discard this Hex.

name: No Funny Stuff
effect: Shootout: No Reactions can be played until after this Shootout is over. No more Shootout actions can be played for this Shootout.

name: No Mint Juleps Here
effect: Noon: Target a location you own or control. Boot the Dude(s) with the highest Influence at the location.

name: Observatory
effect: Private. Controller Reaction: When a pull is revealed, boot the Observatory. The pulling player discards the pull and replaces it with the top card of his or her deck.

name: Only Winged 'Em
effect: Reaction: Play this card when a Dude is aced. The Dude is discarded instead of aced.

name: Out of Ammo
effect: Shootout: Target dude in this Shootout becomes a Draw instead of a Stud.

name: Pacific Maze Railstation
effect: Public. Railstation produces 1 ghost rock per Maze Rat in play. Controller Reaction: Boot Railstation to raise or lower the cost of any goods being purchased by 2 ghost rock.

name: Pact with Darkness
effect: Reaction Hex X: This Hex's Difficulty equals a target Abomination's value. Perform this Hex at the beginning of the Upkeep Phase. If this Hex succeeds, the Abomination's Upkeep is reduced to 0 for this turn. Noon Hex X: This Hex's Difficulty equals twice a target Abomination's value. If this Hex succeeds, the Abomination's Upkeep cost is 0 while this Huckster is in play.

name: Pair of Six-Shooters
effect: Weapon. Shootout: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may discard all five if you desire, otherwise, place them back on top of your deck in the same order.

name: Pearl-Handled Revolver
effect: Weapon. This dude is a Stud in a Shootout.

name: Peevie
effect: Peevie's Upkeep cost is reduced by 1 for each Mad Scientist in your gang.

name: Red Hill Hotel

name: Reggie Cornell
effect: Non-Unique. Reggie's Influence cannot be lowered in any way. Events cannot ace or discard Reggie; cancel any Event that would do so.

name: Relic
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Select a Weapon attached to the Dude. While it remains in play, the Weapon gains an additional +2 Bullet bonus. Ace this card.

effect: Noon: Gain 1 ghost rock.

name: Rumors
effect: Noon: One dude has his Influence reduced by one while he is at any location except at home. The dude's Influence is returned to normal after nightfall.

name: Run-Down Lot
effect: Public. When the Run-Down Lot enters play, you can put it on one of your opponents' streets. The Deeds adjacent to the Run-Down Lot have a -1 Production penalty. A player with the Run-Down Lot on his or her street can boot a Dude at the Run-Down Lot as a Noon action to discard the Run-Down Lot.

name: Runnin' Water
effect: Improvement. Runnin' Water's Deed has the ability "Controller Noon: Boot this Deed. Unboot a Dude at this location."

effect: Noon Miracle 6: Boot this blessed. If this Miracle is successful, straighten one dude in play.

effect: Reaction: Play when one of your dudes is moving to a new location (not as part of a posse). This move does not boot your dude.

Noon: Send a Dude home booted from this location if this location is a Strike you own. Shootout: Target an opposing Dude in this shootout. If the shootout is at a Strike you own, the target is sent home booted.

name: Sleep o' the Dead
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. For the rest of the game, the Dude gains the ability "Noon: Boot a Dude with a lower value at this Dude's location." Ace this card.

name: Sleeping With Shadows
effect: If any Terrors are in play, the player (or players) with the most Terrors in play has his or her lowest-value Dude (or Dudes) aced, and you must ace this card. If no Terrors are in play, this card is discarded without effect.

name: Smiley's Shaft
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Smiling Lizard Lode
effect: Private. Strike. Any dude that is not a Terror is at a -1 Bullet penalty while in a Shootout at this location.

name: Snake Eyes
effect: Reaction: Play after any pull has been revealed to have the pull discarded. The Player performing the pull redraws.

name: Snakebite
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand during a Shootout. Ace one dude in his posse. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Soul Blast
effect: Shootout Hex X: The difficulty of this Hex is an opposing Dude's value plus bullets. If this Hex is successful, the target is booted and sent home. If the Hex is successful by more than 5 points, the target is aced as well. If you pull an ace or Joker, the Huckster is also aced.

name: Speed of the Wolf
effect: Noon Spirit 5: If this Spirit is successful, move one of your unbooted dudes to any location in play. Reaction Spirit 7: If this Spirit is successful when a posse is being formed, then one of your unbooted dudes joins the posse, regardless of location.

name: Spirit of Kentucky Shaft
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Spirit Warrior
effect: Noon Spirit 3: If this Spirit is successful, give a +1 bullet bonus to any Sioux in play until after nightfall. Noon Spirit 7: If this Spirit is successful, give a +2 bullet bonus to any Sioux in play until after nightfall.

name: St. Martin's Chapel
effect: Public. Holy Ground. No Terrors may move to St. Martin's or call out a dude within it.

name: Stained-Glass Windows
effect: Improvement. Stained-Glass Windows can only be attached to an in-town Deed.During a shootout at this location, any player with a Dude in the shootout may, as a Shootout action, throw the fight through the window into the Town Square: discard Stained-Glass Windows and move both posses to the Town Square, ignoring movement restrictions; any Dudes at the Town Square can immediately join a posse.

name: Stampede
effect: Every dude in the Town Square is moved home, booted. No dudes can move to the Town Square this turn.

name: Sticks to Snakes
effect: Shootout Spirit X: The Difficulty of this Spirit is equal to the value of a target Dude in the opposing posse. If this Spirit succeeds, the Dude is sent home booted.

name: Stitchin'
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, the target has the ability "Reaction: When a Harrowed pull is sending this Dude home from a shootout, this Dude is sent home without booting."

effect: Private. Strike.

effect: Strikes a Hawk is a Stud when she has a Bow and Arrow ready.

name: Summon Spirit
effect: Shootout Spirit 6: If this Spirit is successful, a Spirit (dude) is summoned as a member of this posse with a 1 Draw Bullet rating. The Spirit is removed from play at the end of this shootout. Shootout Spirit 9: As above, but the Spirit has a 2 Stud Bullet rating.

name: Sumner's Revenge
effect: If one of your Dudes was aced by another player during a shootout last turn, any one of your Dudes can move to the Town Square and call out any target Dude controlled by the player who aced your Dude. The target Dude must move to the Town Square and accept the shootout. Movement restrictions are ignored.

name: Sun in Yer Eyes
effect: Shootout: Play at the beginning of a Shootout to give one opponent a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) for this Shootout.

name: Surveyor's Office
effect: Private. When a deed with production greater than 3 enters play, the Owner of the Surveyor's office gets one ghost rock.

name: Sweaty Dynamite
effect: Noon Pull: If it is a Club, this dude is aced. Otherwise, boot this dude and leave the Dynamite on this deed. Any dude may ace this card, as a Noon Job. If the Dynamite is still on the deed after nightfall, the deed is aced.

name: Sweetrock- Western Corporate Office
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:24 After revealing your starting posse, you may pay for and put into play one non-Control-Point Strike. Your opponents' Dudes cannot move to that Strike without a card effect. All of your Dudes have a +1 Bullet bonus while at a Strike you own.

name: Sympathy for the Devil
effect: Noon Hex X: This Hex's Difficulty is the value plus twice the Influence of an opponent's Dude at this location. Ace this Hex. This Huckster calls out the Dude, who cannot refuse. No other Dudes can join. Make the Hex pull if the Dude is aced in the shootout. If the Hex succeeds, gain Victory Points equal to the Dude's Influence and remove the Dude from play. No copy of the Dude can enter play this game.

name: Take Ya With Me
effect: Reaction: Play after Hands are revealed during a Shootout. The player who wins this round must also ace one dude, as if he had lost the round.

name: Termite Infestation
effect: Noon: Target an in-town Deed worth at least one Control Point. Boot the Deed. Until a player boots one of his or her Dudes at the Deed as a Noon action, the Deed cannot be unbooted, is considered to have a blank text box, and is worth 0 Control Points. The Deed's Production or Upkeep cost remains the same.

name: Texas Twister
effect: Noon Hex 5: If this Hex is successful, boot one Dude at an adjacent location. Noon Hex X: If this Hex is successful, boot any one Dude in play. The difficulty of the Hex is the target's value plus Influence.

name: That'll Leave a Scar
effect: Reaction: Play after draw hands have been revealed for a Shootout, and immediately before the hands are discarded. Ace any one card in your opponent's Draw Hand. Pay 2 ghost rock or this card is also aced.

name: The 1st Bank of Gomorra
effect: Public. The Controller's ghost rock may not be stolen. If control of the First Bank changes, the new Controller takes half of the old Controller's ghost rock (round down). All dudes have their Influence reduced by one (minimum zero) while at the First Bank.

name: The Agency
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 You get one Victory Point after nightfall every time one of your dudes aces a Terror in a shootout if the Terror has a value of seven or more and ends the turn in Boot Hill.

effect: Private. Any horse the Controller is putting into play has its cost reduced by 3.

name: The Barber's Shop
effect: Public.

name: The Clock Tower
effect: Public. The controller of the Clock Tower gets one Shootout action before The Winner during any Shootout.

name: The Dentist's Office
effect: Private.

name: The Docks
effect: Private. The cost of the Docks is decreased by two if you have Big Jake in play. The Docks produce ghost rock equal to the number of strikes in play.

name: The Drifter
effect: The Drifter's Upkeep cost cannot be reduced.

name: The Evidence
effect: Noon: Discard The Evidence. Target a Wanted Dude in play. The Dude becomes non-Wanted. Noon: Ace The Evidence and pay 2 ghost rock. Target a non-Wanted Dude in play. The Dude becomes Wanted.

name: The Hooded Figure's Scythe

effect: Huckster:1

effect: Experienced. Noon: Move Victor to a location with no Dudes.

effect: Unique. Mystical. The Whateley Family Bible has no ghost rock cost if being attached to Wilhelmina Whateley. Terrors at this Dude's location (including this Dude if he or she is a Terror) have a +1 Bullet bonus, +1 Influence, and a +1 to each skill.

name: William Olson
effect: Town Bailiff. The Bailiff gets a +2 Bullet bonus while in a Shootout against one or more Wanted dudes. The Bailiff gets a +2 Influence bonus while he is at the Courthouse or Jail.
